item.title: Favorite links
item.description: R Programming Fundamentals “R for Data Science” — seminal Tidyverse primer by Hadley Wickham & Garrett Grolemund “Learning R Step by Step” - hard copy book by Richard Cotton Statistics with R — online Duke courses via Coursera R Programming — online Johns Hopkins class via Coursera Data Cleaning with R — online Johns Hopkins class via Coursera Tidyverse Top 50 ggplot visualizations Ggplot2 extensions Online Community R for Data Science (R4DS) Online Learning Community Tidy Tuesday - data sets to practice Tidyverse concepts Tidy Tuesday Rocks - R Shiny compilation of Tidy Tuesday submissions Data Visualization Fundamentals “Fundamentals of Data Visualization” — free online book by Claus Wilke.
